channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Tech Now
channel.desc: A round-up of how AI is being used in many areas of our lives. Ione Wells explores the search for Chile's stolen children, decades after they were taken during the military dictatorship and meets organisations using AI technology to track down missing relatives. Paul Carter visits an Amazon warehouse introducing a new robot with a sense of touch. Alasdair Keane explores AI developments in photography. Plus, can AI clone you? Marc Cieslak puts a digital clone system to the test.
